msg: Fix a minor bug in the default template file.  The template used to not

author: rbb
msg: Remove all files from the buckets directory.  This is in preparation
for committing a patch that actually implements filtering.

author: trawick
msg: APR locks on Unix: Let APR_LOCKALL locks work when APR isn't
built with thread support.  The code needed to realize that
with APR_LOCKALL the intra-thread lock is a no-op.

author: trawick
msg: Tweak apr_getopt() and its use in ab to avoid compiler warnings.
(Note: apr_initopt() and/or its callers still need tweaking.)

author: wrowe
msg: Doc it correctly, even if the const'ness is wrong.
